Requirements You're raging, and you haven't used this ability since you last Raged.

You unleash the energy roiling within you, exploding elemental matter in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[(@actor.level)d8|traits:area-damage]{1d8 damage per level you possess}, with the same type you chose for elemental rage. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true]. Elemental Explosion gains the trait of your element.
